profile:
Clera Windows + Doors by FM Industries has been manufacturing and installing windows and doors throughout all of Ontario since 1978.  They add beauty and value to nearly 1000 homes every month and can easily service the entire province via one of their 37 sales and installation offices.

 

Clera Windows + Doors has been recognized as one of Canada’s Best 50 Privately Managed Companies and the City of Vaughan’s Company of the Year.  Clera was recently awarded the Houzz service award for 2014 and is a proud recipient of the Homestars Best Award for 2012 and 2013. Add to these achievements a stellar A+ Better Business Bureau rating and you’ll understand why Clera Windows + Doors is the best choice for new windows and doors for your home.

 

We manufacture.  We install.  You save.

profile:
We are Ottawa’s busiest Window and Door replacement company. We provide quality service from start to finish. We specialise in residential replacement windows and doors. Delivering fastest possible service in the Ottawa region. We guarantee our work and thrive to make every customer happy.  
We are a local business and we understand what our customers need. We will only offer you the products that you need and will help you find the products that you want.
We will challenge every offer from a competitor by our price match guarantee. Join our family of happy customers and become one yourself. 
Enjoy our products. Enjoy our service. 

PRODUCTS
windows and doors, vinyl windows, replacement windows, steel entry doors, sliding patio doors, storm doors, porch enclosures, fibreglass entry doors.
